snippet: The documentarian Errol Morris has written a book about Jeffrey MacDonald, in prison for the 1970 murder of his wife and children.
abstract: Book A Wilderness of Error: The Trials of Jeffrey MacDonald, written by famed documentary filmmaker Errol Morris, is a reinvestigation of the case of Jeffrey MacDonald, in prison for the 1970 murder of his wife and children; Morris became interested in the tortured legal case over a decade ago and wrote the book after unsuccessfully shopping a film about the murders.
lead_paragraph: The documentarian Errol Morris has written a book about Jeffrey MacDonald, in prison for the 1970 murder of his wife and children.

headline.seo: Errol Morris Takes on MacDonald Murder Case
headline.print_headline: Prying Open The Ultimate Cold Case

keywords.value: A Wilderness of Error: The Trials of Jeffrey MacDonald (Book)
